The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them. Just when you think it's all clear and danger-free,... Love this movie and am sure to watch more.

While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive their descendents placed amongst skyscrapers of the future that includes problems with walking upright. Originally done by Fred C. "Tex" Avery and others, it found use in television when airing out recent MGM cartoons rather than earlier shorts.
An early Tex Avery effort for MGMCat Ideas: Silly Symphony

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it was still produced more than 60 years ago! That's why I decided to look at this masterpiece from another point of view : for its cinematographic quality. Camera work

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an example of creative freedom and having fun with an action movie. Well, until they buckle down to the love interest subplot near the end of the story and find a way to flesh out Joe’s character a bit more.
The movie actually starts off with two opening credits sequences,
